title: Staying Healthy
description: Read tips about how to stay healthy.

passage.text:
Staying healthy is important, and there are many simple things you can do every day to improve your health.

First, you should drink plenty of water - about 8 glasses a day. Water helps your body work properly and keeps you energized. You shouldn't drink too many sugary drinks like soda.

Second, you have to get enough sleep. Adults should sleep 7-8 hours per night. When you don't get enough sleep, you feel tired and you may get sick more easily.

Third, regular exercise is important. You don't have to go to the gym - even walking for 30 minutes a day is helpful. Exercise makes your heart stronger and improves your mood.

Finally, you should eat a balanced diet with lots of fruits and vegetables. You shouldn't skip breakfast because it gives you energy for the day.

Remember: small healthy habits can make a big difference!
